meanings.definition: A woman who is the most respected or prominent in a particular field.
meanings.sent1: In the world of ballet, the doyenne is the principal dancer.
meanings.sent2: She is considered the doyenne of French cuisine in our town.
meanings.sent3: The doyenne of gardening always has the most beautiful flowers in her yard.
meanings.sent4: As the doyenne of the fashion industry, she sets the trends for everyone else.
meanings.sent5: The doyenne of literature captivates readers with her timeless stories.

meanings.definition: The oldest or most experienced woman in a group.
meanings.sent1: At 90 years old, Grandma is the doyenne of our family.
meanings.sent2: The doyenne of the knitting club has been knitting for over 50 years.
meanings.sent3: The doyenne of the book club always brings the most interesting book choices.
meanings.sent4: She is the doyenne of the hiking group, leading the way on every trail.
meanings.sent5: The doyenne of the choir has a voice that still enchants audiences after all these years.
